attributes.action: ignore the request for a Remembrance Day Bank Holiday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is to register the interest of those who find the idea of a long weekend holiday around Remembrance Sunday inappropriate. 

I don’t think it’s right to associate that time with holidays - instead of thinking about what the Forces do for us, everyone will be wondering about what they’re going to do for the long weekend.

rejection.details: We do not accept petitions on other petitions.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
